page.title: 11HERMITAGE SCHOOL HALL
page.content: There have been vague plans to build a hall for many years. The Parish Council decided to commit money to the project with the object of the completed hall being available for parish use outside school hours, compensating for the lack of alternative sporting facilities in the village. The Parish Council, by increasing the local rate, will contribute just over Â£20,000 towards a project which has cost some Â£90,000. School activities in the hall will include assembly, PE and games, drama and movement, concerts and plays, parents' meetings and PTA events. The Parish Council expect local groups to use the hall for badminton, keep fit, basket ball, cricket, netball, softball, etc.
